Name: Supriya
Title: Awesome customer service
Review: I have booked private screening in sathyam cinemas. Customer service was top notch and really appreciable. Big thanks and shout out to the staff Dineshwaran. He was so helpful in arranging things to us. The best service we have ever experienced

Name: Dr P Nagaraj
Title: Classic Theatre üé≠
Review: One of the finest decent theatre with ambiance and great üëç Hygienic restaurant as well Helping Staff with Concerned

Name: Jaykann
Title: Simply best in town
Review: Sathyam cinemas is always the best regardless of all other new multiplexes. It's not just movie that you watch but it's an experience there. Great quality picture and sound system. Clean, hygienic and very well maintained. Worth spending each penny there. Best hangout place in Chennai.

Name: arnold ahmed
Title: Solid Bass sound
Review: Sathyam one of the best cinemas with not much competition may be from ags and pvr. Sound is good although after you exit the streets are not pleasant.

Name: Arogya Raj
Title: Famous for Buttery Popcorn
Review: A Unique brand and it is one of the best theater in Chennai city. Well maintained Walking area, Washrooms, Cafeteria, Bike & Car Parking Places.Reasonable two wheeler and four wheeler parking rates ‚Çπ10 for bikes, ‚Çπ20 for Car. It is one of the Wonderful Place to go for movie with all types of relationship Peoples. Sound quality is excellent and Never miss to have buttery Pop Corn & cold coffee and cream donuts.

Name: Mitesh Bhandari
Title: Pride of Chennai
Review: This is the best hang out places of Chennai. Quality of Cinema to Next Level. Popcorn is a must! Obviously with some Cheese seasoning (Freeeeeeeeee)

Name: Mohammed khan
Title: Movie üé• time in Sathyam cinemas
Review: Sathyam cinemas are good choices to visit watch movies üé• in cinemas First show watch in elite B6 and 2nd show in elite c13 totally are different experience If you‚Äôre in Chennai enjoy your some time in Sathyam cinemas üé•üé•üé¨üéûüìΩ

Name: #amosamiyanayeküéß
Title: üé•
Review: my favourite always... management are perfect and professional, insight of the theatre   gaming zone own branded food court and play area for kids...

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: The best maintained multiplex in the heart of the city.
Review: It is the first multiplex I watched movie in Chennai and felt awesome. But the opinion. You will find very spacious parking area. Easily accessible from Mount Road. The food and snacks are also AWESOME. it's easily  accessible as it is close to 1000 lights mask on Mount Road. Great parking place. The entire area behind the multiplex is dedicated to parking. And it is very huge.

Name: Abdul wahaab
Title: Best theterical experience
Review: One of the most famous theater in the city which is located on the place where the traffic will be always quite high Best theterical experience and seating were very comfortableLast but not least Sathyam popcorn is the best popcorn

Name: Dr Javed Rasheed
Title: Sheer Nostalgia
Review: Though I don‚Äôt go the movies much now and when I do it‚Äôs occasionally but this theatre brings back a lot of old memories of my medical student days.I first visited this theatre in August 1975 when the iconic blockbuster movie ‚Äú Sholay ‚Äú was released and coincidentally I joined my MBBS  in Madras Medical College in the same month and have seen a lot of blockbuster movies in that theatre in my student days.Going back there was sheer nostalgia though it had three theatres then with Sathyam as the main complex.These days are days of Multiplex and complexes with a lot of focus on eatables & snacks and it‚Äôs a costly affair especially in some theatres that offer you gold class but going down the memory lane those days the ticket then seemed like pittance when compared to the present trends and changing times of availability,affordability and luxury.Those were days when home theatres were not there neither Netflix or Amazon Prime ! It was booking ( not on line ) no movie apps on cell phones ( there were no cell phones then almost 45 years ago when one went with friends or the family to enjoy a movie with ones loved ones in a movie theatre which was a sheer delightful experience especially if the movie was good as one enjoyed the ambience experience,company... it was indeed sheer delight !Dr.Javed Rasheed

Name: G Muralitharan
Title: Sathyam is Sathyam
Review: Move starts on Dot. Very comfortable in terms of seating, accessibility and ambiance.  Very good service and customer friendly staff. Centre of the city and always gives comfort when we watch movie only at Satyam.

Name: ushatr
Title: Movie mania....
Review: It's the best place in the city to watch movies....its always buzzing with crowds and loud chatter. Young, old, toddlers, babies everyone is here to watch the story unfold. Great food and popcorn in large quantities. Moviegoers ....place!!

Name: Amudhan Senthan S
Title: Always the best for an awesome movie experience
Review: The best place to go when it comes for movies. World class movie watching  experience is assured, once accustomed to this you will never be satisfied  with  any other cinema halls in the city. Don't miss the best n tastiest popcorn during the intermission break. An overall  satisfaction assured.

Name: Cyrus
Title: One of the best place for movie in Chennai
Review: I always like to go to sathyam cinemas, as its one of the good screens in Chennai. Parking is fixed not hours based like other malls. Popcorn and other food is less expensive compared to the other big screens like pvr inox etc...

Name: KS SUNDHARESUN
Title: fantastic experience
Review: nice interior, good food and ample car parking. nice interior, good food and ample car parking.nice interior, good food and ample car parking.nice interior, good food and ample car parking

Name: rajm
Title: Great cinema
Review: Its the best movie theatre in chennai and I'm sure one of the best in India.. It has great screen amazing sound great seats and also the canteen is the best in India.  It's a unique experience. Try the cake shop in the ground floor it has some amazing desserts..

Name: Salsa Praveen
Title: Amazing experience
Review: Sathyam is one of the trusted movie spaces in Chennai with over localities in different areas. Amazing popcorns

Name: Ganesh K
Title: Movies in wrong hands
Review: Since they're having name and they don't care for anything. Staff's are very rude. Parking ticketing snacks counters are not maintained properly even toilets are stinking. Very small lift to all the floors. No proper direction sign board. Don't spoil your movie experience in a wrong place.

Name: harish
Title: Snacks at theatresüé≠ = sathyam cinemas
Review: Good for watching movies Best for "Snacks at theatresüé≠ = sathyam cinemas" Aspeciall popcorn  with top loads is amazing

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: The first multiplex theatre I visited in Chennai
Review: I love this theatre. Its very close to thousand lights mosque and mount road. So there is no problem of public transport. Parking space is also very huge. Very systematic maintainance of the theatre makes your visit so memorable.

Name: Arihant Katariya
Title: Super Theater With Very Big Screens
Review: Super Theater To Watch Movies..We Visited 1st Time And Watched Kabir Singh In The Theater..The Sound Clarity & Ambience In The Theater Was Very Good..Butter Pop Corn @ The Theater Is A Must Try @ A Reasonable Price..

Name: DSKTraveller
Title: For a comfortable movie watching experience
Review: Sathyam Cinemas are meant for those looking forward to a comfortable movie watching experience. The movie halls are well maintained and the eating options are of high quality. Sathyam Cinemas in Royapettah is the parent theatre of the Sathyam group (now purchased by PVR) in Chennai. Unlike its other cinema halls located in the Express Avenue and Forum Vijaya Mall, this is located in a slightly congested locality. However, the movie halls are clean and offer a good experience for the movie goer. The food sold in the canteen is of good quality. Some of the favourite items include the cream doughnut, vegetable puffs and chat items. For those who love popcorn, their varieties are the best. Only thing is you have to buy those big tubs of popcorn unlike the earlier days when they would serve in smaller quantities. The ID restaurant is also located inside the complex. Parking of vehicles, especially cars, is quite a task though. It is generally recommended that you reach there early if you want a parking space.

Name: TE K
Title: Entertainment
Review: I visited this place with my friends. Those who want to watch Telugu movies it is one option in Chennai.

Name: Suresh V
Title: An electrifying place to enjoy a movie..!
Review: Setting standards in movie watching.. probably one of the pioneers in Chennai, has been doing a good job to maintain the class and offerings.  Very hitech and awesome experience.  The road being one way, the parking is a bit circularly confusing - keep 10mts etc for parking itself.

Name: Hari Shankar
Title: High class movie complex
Review: Nice place to watch movies with friends and family. One of the best and good theatre in Chennai. Always improving better. Good screen and sound quality. Parking facilities and arrangements are good. Highly recommend.

Name: Kandaswami Aravind
Title: Most favourite cinema hall
Review: Best cinima hall in Chennai. Good maintenance. Quality service. More comfortable place to watch cinema in city with parking.

Name: Vikram J
Title: Best theatre of city
Review: Best theatre of city. Excellent screen sound and interior. In city so cheap parking and must try their popcorn with different flavours

Name: K V K
Title: Satyam
Review: Satyam cinemas is a multiplex theatre complex. Multiple cinemas are screened at the various screens. The halls are well equipped. The sound system is indeed good. The seating arrangements are also good. The vehicle parking place is vast and can accommodate a good number of vehicles, both 4 wheelers as also 2 wheelers. The theatre complex has retained the old charm to a great extent. The only drawback is that the theater is in a small road.

Name: JumboMumbai
Title: Lovely case of rejig
Review: One has to stay with the times.. especially if in the service industry And this is a lovely exampleThe thetre leaves little from old times for good measureAnd is a throbbing successAmple parking... good food.. and of course great movies

Name: Khyati
Title: All in one
Review: This cinema has eating area along with game zone.. kids love it too.. big screen and nice seating they offer..

Name: Harshil Mehta
Title: Amazing Theatre
Review: Good experience, Good Multiplex. The popcorn always taste the best, the restroom was very neat and clean, concessions counter was really well maintained, staffs were very helpful and kind, movie experience was as always amazing

Name: SrikanthSivaraj
Title: Always a good experience
Review: Satyam is an iconic multiplex in Chennai. Good to see that the movie halls are maintained clean and the experience is still as good as it used to be.

Name: Aparna R
Title: The best place for a movie watching experience in the heart of Chennai
Review: Being not much of a movie goer, if I need to watch a movie, then  I would watch one , only if there are shows either  in Sathyam cinemas or at Escape. right from entering the car park, until you find your seat, one is always welcomed by courteous staff.  As for this particular visit, since the show had begun with the screening of advertisements, due to whihc the lights had already dimmed out, we struggled our way to our seats as there was no, numbering. Luckily we could locate our rows easily. However, one had to quickly count and check if we were going towards are reserved seats only. I wish the seats had numbers displayed and glowing in the dark.We had  in the past had  the snacks &  beverages delivered to our seats, but I dont seem to see that practice anymore, I wonder why?

Name: Harvey
Title: Very good experience
Review: Was at Sathyam Cinemas to watch the Rajinikanth starrer Pettai with a friend. I was visiting this cinema after over two decades. They have really done it up very well - the theatre has leather, spacious seats. You get good snacks (not cheap though). The restrooms are clean and well maintained. Corporatisation has done a world of good for this cinema.

Name: umang p
Title: Weekend program
Review: One of the best in Chennai. The parking is cheap as well probably because it‚Äôs their own place and they aren‚Äôt renting the place out but it‚Äôs a huge plus for people who head to the theatre a lot. The seating is good and the popcorn is the best I‚Äôve had (especially the topping flavors).The parking lot is huge which is a plus but the token system for the parking is not a good one, especially when you are heading out after the movie.There is a cafe as well within the same premise including a video arcade. Overall a very good experience, this place.

Name: Anusuya D
Title: Great Satyam cinemas
Review: Great multiplex theatre in Chennai. Excellent sound effects, good seating arrangement, cleanliness, and tasty snacks at the theatre outer places

Name: pushpa p
Title: Cinema na Sathyam cinemas!
Review: Ever since I knew what films are, it's been Sathyam cinemas.. place is tooo good to be left out... Even if there are many new cinemas coming up, Sathyam remains like a home.. the comfort that one can get here, I don't think any other theater offers such a comfortable place for family audience... People come with families, friends and kids... Comfortable and looks good.. love for the cream bun n chocolate bun never fadedüòã lovely place, but parking takes more time, so plan it accordingly!

Name: Sridhar K
Title: Great Multiplex
Review: Excellent Multiplex.  Great seating! excellent audio!  Great ambience! good food! neat and clean toilets!

Name: PTG1976
Title: A Tamil movie at Satyam cinema
Review: I visited the Satyam complex after a few years to watch a movie with colleagues. There have been good improvements. The walkway into the hall is broad; the steps are broad and well lit. The seats are comfortable. The acoustics were excellent. Only the snacks like popcorn have become expensive.  The row car park is functional but if after the movie, one car gets delayed or if a car owner wants to leave in the middle of the movie, it becomes impossible to leave.

Name: Curious793410
Title: Nice theater
Review: Theater seating is very comfortable,  but too much of crowd because of new year,  yearly three times I used to watch movies there

Name: maheshk19
Title: Cinema Heaven
Review: Close to heart theatre for all cinema lovers. Popcorn, DND and Blind date are unique features of sathyam, one should definitely try atleast once.

Name: justin s
Title: Best sound effects
Review: We have gone for a movie a while but this time we have choosed sathyam main screen, Wat a sound effect it's very clarity and surrounding perfect theatre to enjoy ur holidays.

Name: shyam K
Title: Best Cinemas in Chennai for movie , food, VR and kids care
Review: The sathyam cinemas is truly a landmark in Chennai. Not only did it revolutionize the movie effects with state of the art display and sound systems, but also redefined the movie experience with gourmet food.The Sathyam pop corn is probably the best. Best entertainment place in Chennai

Name: Sharath power
Title: Nice Sathyam cinemas
Review: Me and my family watch film nice interval foods simply good weather not bad say anything you are really enjoy this place simply

Name: VijayKB
Title: Best multiplex in city centre
Review: Conveniently located multiplex in heart of city. Very comfortable seating, good interiors and sound system. Easily accessible. Cheapest parking. Fantastic south indian eatery ID is located within the multiplex. Excellent for family outing.

Name: Thiru71
Title: Aware of Parking...
Review: All new comers to Sathyam Cinemas will have irritating experience when they are in 2 wheeler or 4 wheeler. Because they will cross the parking area in Whites road and land before the theatre in Peters Road, where the security would should to make a round about. Both Car and 2 wheeler parking are open. Snacks in the Cinemas are good with reasonable price. Must to visit place in Chennai.

Name: Karthik
Title: Main screen sound system not good
Review: I am a big fan of sathyam cinemasNow sathayam main screen they changed qsc speaker to sls speaker.Qsc is the best speaker and best low frequency effect.

Name: Jothilingam E
Title: One of best
Review: One of best cinemas in the heart of chennai..must visit and also enjoy the tasty food in nearby places

Name: venkat-Chenai
Title: Theatre with great ambience
Review: This theatre is quite centrally located with beautiful interiors, offers pleasant viewing experience and good sound systems. Truely worth

Name: Suresh M
Title: Top class cinemas
Review: Well made , comfortable seating, top class sound system . All these features make it an enjoyable experience to watch a movie.Moreover a large variety of food is available and can be served at your seat in the theater.

Name: arti b
Title: Located at whites road with a big parking ground
Review: It is a cinema hall with okayish sound system, wide seats, not too wide leg space. There is ID restaurant inside. Lift is too small. Be prepared to climb the stairs only. Or you need to wait for 10 mins at least to get into lift.

Name: nandad602
Title: Comfortable place to view movies
Review: Viewing movie at Sathyam Theatre is awesome. You can relax and enjoy the experience. More than watching movies you feel that you are in a most friendly place. The experience of watching is also so good which makes you to totally involve in the movie and you can feel it also. Happy and safe movie experience with family only at sathyam theatres.

Name: Akhil P
Title: Time to enjoy with friends
Review: Good sound system huge screen with a visual treat very enjoyable atmosphere with decent amount of food we get there

Name: Reetesh K
Title: Best Multiplex
Review: Chennai's best multiplex in all aspects be it seating or sound or screen everthing in of high standards. Don't miss the popcorn here. It is <3.

Name: kundu94
Title: Food price is very reasonable
Review: Compared to other multiplex Sathyam Cinema is so cozy and easy to park and get out from the hall at the end.

Name: Ayesha F
Title: One of the oldest in Chennai
Review: Although the Halls are not as trendy as the latest theaters, but the screens are big enough. Still one of the most popular places to catch a movie. Tip: Do cross over to the main road to check out the oldest bookstore in Chennai, now operating as Writer's Cafe.

Name: Alwardurai
Title: Couple visit
Review: One of the important place in Chennai, everyone should visit Satyam cinema's since this one have a big screen in Chennai..

Name: cinthu88
Title: Watch cinema
Review: It was really worth to watch movies in this theatre. It was really neat and clean. Parking also low price .

Name: Terence S
Title: Excellent movie ambience.
Review: Sathyam has multiple screens in a location in the heart of Chennai. Adequate parking facilities and great snack options

Name: KMJ
Title: best destination in chennai for movies
Review: One of the best theater in overall terms of a movie experiencing. I would rate this theatre as one of the best in India in terms of visual quality. Snacks are comparatively cheaper compared most of the other multiplexes esp. given the quality of food. It has amazing south Indian Restaurant ID in the same building. a place to leave toddlers safely while you have a great movie experience. very good parking mechanism. If you are in Chennai and a movie buff do not miss this theatre. I have gone here as a couple, family, friends, business partner, solo and not once have I been disappointed. if the parking is full there is an annex parking and shuttle that runs between the theatre building and the annex parking.

Name: Sandhya I
Title: The best cinema experience
Review: Have been to cinema theatres all over india and there is nothing to match satyam cinemas. The ambience, comfort, options, seating, sound, food menu, everything screams love and attention to detail. Its a movie goers dream come true and all this at extremely affordable prices. I wish satyam has cinemas all over India.

Name: Vishal Balwani
Title: A nice place to unwind after a day‚Äôs work
Review: Cinemas in Chennai are not a thing to be taken lightly because the local crowd will always be thronging over to cinema halls and you won‚Äôt find vacant seats unless you book tickets in advance. Also to be noted here is that the pricing of tickets in Chennai theatres is done by the government and the prices are moderate. So this gives another reason for the theatres to be completely booked most of the time. This one is a good theatre. The seats are comfortable and there is parking space available too.

Name: Venga
Title: Pride and proud Satyam Cinemas
Review: Non other Cinemas like PVR, INOX are after Satyam Cinemas since 1974. It was only in Chennai now it is expanded in all the south Indian states.  It is famous for sound quality auro 11.1 and dolby atmos And praise for his favorite spicy popcorn

Name: Azara T
Title: Best popcorn n amazing theatre
Review: We had gone there to watch the movie Mersal. The place has a great atmosphere and environment. The service, food and the beverages are also amazing especially the popcorn, which you can't get anywhere else except in Sathyam and the partnered theatres.

Name: Akila P
Title: A great hangout place....
Review: Sathyam is a cool place.. it is famous for the different flavored popcorn.. you can see yo yo youth crowd....

Name: movies H
Title: Great picture quality
Review: The place offers a great screen and great picture quality,this was the first multiplex I visited so enjoyed it a lot

Name: Anand K
Title: Best sound effects in Chennai
Review: Now you may see more theatres under spi but always Sathyam cinemas is best in Chennai ,the sound effects is simply out of the world must visit for all

Name: Vaibhav_1990
Title: Movie time
Review: The best place in town . Be it with your partner or your family . If you have to watch a movie in Chennai . Then think about only one place . SATHYAM CINEMAS . Everything‚Äôs perfect there .

Name: vmsatheesh22
Title: Good
Review: Sathyam cinemas, good place to visit and view cinema in beautiful atmosphere, we all like the sound arrangements and screens

Name: shantanug739
Title: Super experience
Review: Excellent experience: the ticket prices are very affordable as they are govt. regulated. The food is awesome. Do have the famous Sathyam popcorn and cream rolls. There are many screens and each one is customised with pretty cool themes. Cleanliness and staff hospitality is par excellence.

Name: Aman Gupta
Title: Good cinema hall
Review: It is one of the best cinema halls in Chennai. Screen size and sound quality are really good. You will experience great quality there.

Name: AniRanjRoh
Title: Nice Movie Experience
Review: Have been going here every time we visit Chennai. Fav theatre to go to. Movie choices are nice as well, located centrally to some shops as well. Def recommend to be cleaner.

Name: Guddu Anand
Title: Movie Nite
Review: Too Bad Air Conditioning ... And Very Expensive Eatables ... Even Water Is Priced Exorbitantly ... Parking Is Another Issue ...

Name: SubbaramDanda
Title: THE SHEEN IS DIMINISHING
Review: We were at "Six Degrees," a screen in the Sathyam cinema complex recently to watch Tamil movie "Irumbuthirai."  When we entered the hall, we were aghast to see that trash left behind by the people of the previous show was still there.  After a few minutes, janitors came in and cleared the trash.  This was not expected of a high class theatre. A word about lighting.  In the dim light before the start of the film, people especially elders, found it difficult to go to their seats.  Why not have good lights till the film starts?  And, for the people coming in somewhat early there is not much of space to sit and relax.

Name: prasannareddy
Title: Excellent place for entertainment
Review: One of best movie theatre in the world that I have seen,food was excellent.screen all language movies.

Name: Ajitku
Title: Movie
Review: it is a movie theater. Mostly all types of movies screening here. the place is clean and neat. enjoyed movie with friends.

Name: BHMDUDE
Title: Sathyam vs Santham
Review: We heard a lot about Chennai Sathyam cinema so we booked our tickets through bookmyshow. This cinema is located inside a mall type building owned by Sathyam cinema. Our theatre was screen 5. And guess what screen 5 was santham not Sathyam. And this theatre was not upto the mark as well. They should mention at the time of booking that whether we are booking for Sathyam or santham.

Name: srbkct
Title: Entertainment!!!
Review: After long time, back to Satyam. Visited Sathyam Elite. Big screen, good sound effect. only point i felt to be improve at food counters is to see other options to add the flavours to popcorn ;) it is very uncomfortable to add it once the tub is filled....

Name: ananthakp
Title: A Decent Cine Complex
Review: Originally,started with Three Screens, with Sathyam being the biggest in terms of seating capacity was purely a cinema hall.  With the advent of complex concept, added more screens and eateries making it a bit cramped in space. Said that, within the constraints, well maintained. Parking, though is huge, if all halls run full, you will have to wait for the vehicles in front to move before you can take your car.

Name: Gowri V
Title: Raazi
Review: Great movie, well taken, Excellent characterisation. All artists did justice to their role particularly the lead role Superb performance.

Name: Rucha121
Title: Best Movie-Theatre
Review: Move over Inox and PVR.. while you are in Chennai.. enjoy the best movie-watching experience only at Sathyam cinemas.. It is difficult to get hold of movie tickets of newly released or hit movies on weekend.. Other than movie, their snacks - popcorn and veg puff are really delicious. Very good maintenance and nice experience.

Name: Rohan A
Title: Rocking Sathyam
Review: Definitely it is one of the biggest theatre & visual & sound effects are really amazing.The cleanliness of the theatre is really good..

Name: Raghul J
Title: Best Theatre I have ever seen
Review: The main screen here has a capacity more than 500 seats which gives you great experience while watching movies of your favourite stars...maintainance  is very good..worth every penny you spend... great sound...i would say No 1 theatre in the city..

Name: kripa a
Title: Nice one
Review: I have been there with my collegues for a movie outing.  Well maintained place.  Nice sound facility. We enjoyed

Name: drsivakumar87
Title: The best
Review: One of the best cinema theatres in the world ... pretty clean .... sound effects were amazing .... picture quality was top notch

Name: Kirrthana
Title: Great experience
Review: Very comfortable seats... Great service by the staffs... Clean washrooms... Very good sound system... Evidently, I enjoyed watching 'Sathya' movie in sathyam cinemas... üòú

Name: Sairam R
Title: Good multiplex
Review: This is a multiplex cinema complex with car parking and snacks and in the heart of Chennai.  This is one of the oldest multiplexes in Chennai but still they are maintaining at a decent level.

Name: Sindhuja N
Title: Is there a better cinemas in town?!
Review: Satyam has created its own benchmark in this city. The sound quality, screen clarity, service, ambience.. What not, satyam brings you everything. The best part is they provide you a home feeling giving out blankets when needed, whatspp-ing them if any group or individual is creating disturbance and also have installed sanitary napkins dispenser which i would say the best move any cinemas can provide. A big thumbs up to the best cinemas!

Name: jasjas867
Title: Too crowded
Review: Though the management is trying its best, the crowd seems too overwhelming. Pushing and jumping queues is a common sight. Not much of security measures. The crowd seems a bunch of unruly college kids who do not even bother to throw the popcorn tubs or coke cups in the bin.the sign boards for different screens seem confusing. All in all, not worth for a family outing.

Name: Girija Muralidharan
Title: Enjoyed the Hindi film Hitchki.
Review: Sathyam Theatres took over the old dilapidated Thyagaraja cinema theatre in LB road Adyar some years back. Since then the theatre is well maintened , there are only two screens one in  down floor and one in 1st floor. The food counter has many delicious items to choose from. The only problem in this complex is, the washroom for ladies is upstairs. Hope the authorities do something about this.  As we live in Adyar we find this the most convenient theatre to go and watch movies at a short notice. I certainly need to mention about the efficiency and the helpful nature of the  staff who regulate the traffic inside the theatre compound. They guide you to park the car very well.  After the show the cars glide out of the compound effortlessly.

Name: Lavanya J
Title: Keeping up with Times
Review: Sathyam theatre has ensured they upkeep with customers demands. Have been in existence for more than two decades and ever since I remember this place has only gone up in standards. The food across all their chain of theaters has been excellent and they ensure cleanliness and hygiene. Recently their parking rates have come down too. There are restaurants, gaming and bowling besides cinema under one roof. Hope they continue to maintain their high standards

Name: vasuprofiles
Title: Satyam Cinemas - a lovely place to watch a movie
Review: I had been to Satyam many times. I have been going there since more than a decade. Back then the parking was different than what it is now. Anyways that is not the point of discussion now. We'll a cool place to watch a movie. There are many screens and is in the heart of the city. The seating and arrangement are good. The food and beverages are expensive but it is the same in every mall. That wouldnt be a bad idea to watch a movie there.

Name: Rahul D
Title: Best movie experience...and a gaming centre
Review: Best place in Chennai to watch a movie...a complete descent arena...lots of stuffs .many screens...a big arena..for gaming lovers.."blurr"... Its a gaming spot.. good to go..

Name: Ramaswamytalari
Title: First cinemas in Chennai.
Review: Superb cinema .nice ambient .id is place one of the best place to eat Italian food.very nice combos also available

Name: Balaji D
Title: Cozy viewing experience
Review: Seats are comfortable. Good viewing and Audio. Clean toilets with an advertisement screen on each section to make it more personal

Name: kvramani
Title: Excellent movie theatre
Review: We watched Padmavat in Satyam cinemas recently.It is a very reputed group, managing excellent theatres and multiplexes, large to mini screens with various seating capacities, with latest video and audio systems, clean ambience, good maintenance, variety of snack options, online booking including for food, ..... WoW. It is a great experience to watch a movie in Satyam group of cInemas.

Name: Shveta S
Title: Hub of movies with kids area
Review: If you love movies you will love satyam, they even have arrangements to keep kids& teenagers involved while you enjoy your movie.Famous for their popcorn& snacks.They have a restaurant name ID so 1 can enjoy  the meal with friends/family.

Name: Sadi A
Title: Very posh, fantastic experience
Review: A cinema experience like never before for me. Even the freshrooms had fittings like 5 star hotels. The screens are of the best quality and the sound experience is world class. Very very affordable pricing for tickets. A heaven for cinena lovers.

Name: Free@will
Title: Watched 15.17 to Paris.
Review: Had been here to watch an English movie, 3.30 pm show. At the booking counter one doesn't get the option to choose the seats. The girl at the counter couldn't speak or understand much English. Once inside the screening hall the ambience was nice. The sound effects were outstanding. Surprisingly, for an afternoon show English movie each ticket cost 190 bucks approx. Barely 10 people were in.
